conversation.Name: Alice
conversation.Text: Excuse me, sir. Do you have any updates on the train delay?

conversation.Name: Beth
conversation.Text: We've been waiting for quite some time now.

conversation.Name: Conductor
conversation.Text: I apologize for the inconvenience. There was a signal issue further down the line.

conversation.Name: Alice
conversation.Text: Is there any estimate on how long the delay will be?

conversation.Name: Beth
conversation.Text: We might miss our connecting train if this continues.
